import { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Segment, Image, Grid, Icon, Divider, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Signup from '../auth/Signup' import Login from '../auth/Login' import img from '../media/hellbentLogo.png' import GoogleAuth from '../auth/GoogleAuth' const LoginPage = () => { const [signupVisible, setSignupVisible] = useState(false) return ( <>
{(signupVisible && ) || {setSignupVisible(true)} }/>}
) } export default LoginPage
